examples.example: 在网络的世界里，我结识了许多友善的网友，我们一起分享着生活的点滴。

translate.english: In the world of the Internet, I have met many friendly netizens, and we share the bits and pieces of life together.

examples.example: 我的一位网友给我分享了很多有趣的事情，让我感到特别开心。

translate.english: One of my online friends shared a lot of interesting things with me, which made me feel extremely happy.

examples.example: 我和那位热心的网友一起探讨问题，收获了不少快乐和知识。

translate.english: I discussed problems with that enthusiastic netizen together and gained quite a lot of happiness and knowledge.
